ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of KIM HEATHER POLOWEK of Port Moody, British Columbia, as a part-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Vancouver Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective December 5, 2021.
